meanings.definition: A television program consisting of a limited number of episodes.
meanings.sent1: I watched a miniseries about a detective solving a mystery.
meanings.sent2: The miniseries I saw last night was very exciting.
meanings.sent3: The miniseries had me on the edge of my seat with its suspenseful plot.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a miniseries, full of unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The miniseries painted a vivid picture of life in the 1920s.
